name: Wereowl
description: The Wereowl is a medium humanoid capable of transforming into a humanoid form, an owl-humanoid hybrid, and a giant owl, with sharp talons and a humanoid appearance.
memorable: Its ability to curse humanoids with lycanthropy and its stealthy, flight capabilities make it a dangerous foe.
goals: Typically seeks to manipulate situations from the shadows and consolidate power.
relations: May serve or be allied with other cunning or evil creatures.
environment: Usually found in dark, wooded areas or urban environments where it can blend in.
strengths: Immunities to nonmagical physical damage, excellent stealth and perception skills, and versatility in combat due to shapechanging.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to silvered weapons, which bypass its damage immunities.
attacks: Can attack with rapacious talons in owl form or use shortswords and shortbows in humanoid form.
most_powerful_ability: Shapechanger ability allows it to transform and adapt to the battlefield.
senses: Has keen hearing and sight, granting it advantage on perception checks relating to these senses.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, with high scores in both.
additional_information: Does not provoke opportunity attacks when flying away from enemies.
Silent Flight enhances its stealth while airborne.
Returns to humanoid form upon death.
Can sense threats effectively with advantage on perception checks.
Has a solid mix of offense and defense.
test_queries: stealthy humanoid that transforms into an owl
humanoid creature that can become a giant owl
dangerous stealthy wereowl in wooded areas
